stimulusHtml: What, if anything, is printed as a result of executing this code segment?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment.

 

String str = "qrstu";
String result = "";
for (int j = 0; j < str.length(); j++)
{
   result += str.substring(0, j + 1);
}
System.out.println(result);

choicesHtml: Nothing is printed because an  IndexOutOfBoundsException  occurs.
